title: Elliptic Ruijsenaars-Schneider and Calogero-Moser Models Represented by Sklyanin Algebra and sl(n) Gaudin Algebra
abstract: The relationship between Elliptic Ruijsenaars-Schneider (RS) and Calogero-Moser (CM) models with Sklyanin algebra is presented. Lax pair representations of the Elliptic RS and CM are reviewed. For n=2 case, the eigenvalue and eigenfunction for Lame equation are found by using the result of the Bethe ansatz method.
